snippet: Several major industry groups say proposed limits on the number of visas for low-skilled workers are “unrealistic” and “destined to fail.”
abstract: Several major construction industry groups criticize agreement reached over how many low-skilled guest workers should be granted visas each year, complaining that proposed limits are unrealistic and unworkable; many immigration experts expect that deal will become part of immigration bill.
lead_paragraph: Several major industry groups say proposed limits on the number of visas for low-skilled workers are “unrealistic” and “destined to fail.”

headline.seo: Construction Groups Criticize Guest Worker Deal
headline.main: Construction Groups Criticize Limits in Guest Worker Deal
headline.print_headline: Construction Groups Criticize Limits in Guest Worker Deal

keywords.value: American Federation of Labor-Congress of Industrial Organizations
keywords.name: organizations
